import React from 'react' import './SingleProductPage.css' import Nav from '../Navigation/Nav' import Products from '../Products/Products' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import "." const SingleProductPage = ({ match }) => { const params = useParams() return (
{' '}
{productid} ${Products.price} {Products.desc}
) } export default SingleProductPage
